free: #e There is a story told by the elderly people of our Gluban tribe.
#c 有個我們清流部落的族老流傳下來的故事。
#e I heard about this story long time ago. It has been almost ten years.
#c 我很久以前聽到這則故事。大約快十年了。
#n hari這裡有「快要/將近」的意思。
#e And the elderlies said it is said that we Seediq people used to live in the so-called Truwan area. It was really so in the past.
#c 然後，族老說，聽說我們賽德克人以前住在所謂的Truwan地區。以前也真的是如此。
#e Usually, we do not know the weather beforehand.
#c 平時，我們不能預先知道天氣。
#e Sometimes it rains, and sometimes it is fine.
#e And, in the past, we did not have anything like today’s goods in our Seediq tribe.
#c 而且，以前我們賽德克部落裡，什麼現在的商品都沒有。
#e It was unlike now. Now we go from our tribe to Hori to buy any kind of things.
#c 那不像現在。現在我們從部落到埔里買各種東西。
#e Thus we simply grew food by ourselves, for example, vegetables, and sweet potatoes.
#c 所以，我們乾脆食物自己種植，例如蔬菜、地瓜等。
#e Then, one... it is said that once, no one knows why, there was a really severe drought that year.
#c 然後，一…聽說有一次，也不知怎麼搞的，那一年有一場嚴重的旱災。
#e It was a really severe drought.
#e At first, it was not serious. About one or two months later, there was still food put in their stockhouse.
#c 起初還不嚴重。約一兩個月過去，他們倉庫裡還有食物。
#e Then three months passed. There was almost nothing. In other words, there was no food in the whole Seediq tribe
#c 然後三個月了。幾乎什麼都沒有。也就是說，整個賽德克部落沒有食物。
#e At that time, there was really no food, so hildren were pitiful.
#c 那時候，真的沒有食物，那小孩就可憐了。
#n m-gedang「遺失」「迷失」。為死亡的委婉說法。
#n m-gedang「遺失」「迷失」。為死亡的委婉說法。
#e They died first. Each day one passed away. And sometimes two passed away each day.
#c 他們先死亡。每一天一個去世。然後有時候一天兩個去世。
#e Our ancestors thought it could not be like this.
#c 我們的祖先想，這樣怎麼得了。
#n ma uxe nii di 「這樣怎麼得了」。
#e Let's go move to aother place!
#c 我們搬到另一個地方吧！
#e This is the thought of the ancestor.
#e They thought even though there is drought here, maybe there is no drought in another place. Thus, he said, “Let’s migrate to another place.”
#c 他認為即使這裡旱災，另一個地方可能沒有旱災。所以他說「我們遷徙到另一個地方吧」。
#e The elderly in the tribe at that time, they dicussed.
#c 那時候部落的族老，他們討論。
#n tn-alang在地人；tn-sapah家的主人；tn-huri狗主人。
#n tn-alang在地人；tn-sapah家的主人；tn-huri狗主人。
